name: 4x4 Offroad Monster Truck
description:
The off road monster truck SUV drive will be a great challenge for you to drive the heavy 4x4 SUV jeep stunts on the dangerous mountains and thrilling turns. In this offroad mountain truck driving simulator, you will be having a realistic driving mode and you also have to control the monster truck SUV jeep in the unlimited challenging levels of offroad mountain.
The off road mountain monster truck drive game provides you with best graphical content. The hilly off roads are well managed and properly made to give you feel like you are actually driving the offroad 4x4 jeep to perform the SUV stunts. Enjoy the variety of mountain jeep driving adventure with 4x4 off road SUV monster truck. Experience the thrilling off road 4x4 jeep stunts drive. You can also make some amazing upgrades to your offroad jeep. See the damage of the monster truck driving adventure on the hilly offroad adventure. You are here to drive the best 4x4 monster truck and the SUV jeep stunts drive with the most thrilling hilly environment.

Experience the driving adventure and become the professional SUV jeep driver of the off-road jeep hill climb. There is a direction arrow which will guide you to reach to the right destination in the game of the cruiser 4x4 jeeps. Cross every checkpoint in the offroad 4x4 jeep. The hill tracks will be rough throughout your SUV jeep drive. So, carefully handle the extreme monster truck while going on the up-hill mountain driving adventure.

You will be going to enjoy the most epic 4x4 offroad jeep driving game. Choose your best 4x4 SUV models wisely because your opponents are not weaker than your 4x4 jeep. Whether it is a rainy weather or a sunny or a stormy one you have to beat them. If there is rain or snow then there is high possibility that your best offroad jeep will slip on the turns so be careful or else you will crash your vehicle. Unlock some dangerous tracks and hilly offroad jeep. Win daily rewards by playing the ultimate offroad drive game every day. This offroad 4x4 jeep hill driving simulator is so addicting that you cannot sit idle. So, get going with the offroad extreme mountain jeep stunt.


Features
• Hilly and dangerous mountain drive with different obstacles
• 3D camera view and amazing sound track
• Great control on the gears and brakes
• Different checkpoints to cross
• Exciting 15 levels on the offroad mountain
• Different 4x4 SUV jeep monster truck to drive
